description.p: Resembling small, tough, and elderly human men or undersized wizened gnomes. They have hunched backs, wiry muscles, leathery skins, and evil smiles filled with wickedly sharp, protruding teeth. They wear bright-red leather pointed caps for which they were named; these are always soaked in fresh blood. They wield scythes, sickles, or other heavy bladed weapons that seem much too big for them.
Your redcap character has the following racial traits.

Ability Score Increase.Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Age.Redcaps reach adulthood at age 16 and live up to 120 years.
Alignment.Redcaps are typically chaotic evil, as they care only for their own needs.
Size.Redcaps are between 3 and 4 feet tall and weigh between 40 and 80 pounds. Your size is Small.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 25 feet.
Darkvision.You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Outsize Strength.While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn’t impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.
